sentences.en: Eat the grape and don't ask which vineyard it came from.
sentences.cn: 吃葡萄不要问它来自哪个葡萄园.

sentences.en: From the eagle's nest, there is vineyard as far aseye can see.
sentences.cn: 在那鹰鸟筑巢的地方, 你可以看到一望无际的葡萄园.

sentences.en: Give me your vineyard, that I may have it a vegetable garden.
sentences.cn: 把你的葡萄园给我吧, 我好拿它作菜园;贪得无厌;无理的要求.

sentences.en: In that day , A vineyard of wine, sing of it!
sentences.cn: 赛27:3我耶和华是看守葡萄园的 、 我必时刻浇灌 、 昼夜看守、免得有人损害.

sentences.en: Noah is also said to have been the originator of vineyard cultivation.
sentences.cn: 诺亚也被传说为是葡萄园耕种的创始者.

sentences.en: So the house is falling apart and the vineyard makes undrinkable wine?
sentences.cn: 那么,房子是塌的葡萄园酿难喝的酒?

sentences.en: So they threw him out of the vineyard and killed him.
sentences.cn: 于是把他推出葡萄园外杀了. 这样,葡萄园的主人,要怎样处治他们呢.

sentences.en: That vineyard has taken more than 30 years to develop.
sentences.cn: 这葡萄园的开发已经历了30多年.

sentences.en: The accident happened close to Martha's Vineyard.
sentences.cn: 事故发生在玛莎葡萄园附近。

sentences.en: The Chablis vineyard is the northernmost in Burgundy.
sentences.cn: 沙布利葡萄园在勃艮第的最北边。

sentences.en: The vineyard of Clos de Vougeot is shared between 80 owners.
sentences.cn: 伏旧园的产区由80个庄园主拥有.

sentences.en: The wine was bottled near the vineyard.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒在葡萄园附近被装瓶封藏。

sentences.en: They kept a careful watch over the vineyard throughout the growing season.
sentences.cn: 在整个生长季节,他们都认真地守着葡萄园.

sentences.en: Today he was hoeing in the vineyard.
sentences.cn: 今天他在葡萄园里锄地。

sentences.en: What therefore shall the lord of the vineyard do unto them?
sentences.cn: 这样，葡萄园的主人，要怎样处治他们呢。

sentences.en: Who plants a vineyard and does not eat of its grapes?
sentences.cn: 有谁13栽葡14萄园,不15吃园里的果子 呢 ?

sentences.en: Who plants a vineyard and does not partake of its fruit?
sentences.cn: 有谁栽种葡萄园,不吃园中的果子?

words.tran_cn: 葡萄酒的；嗜酒的；有葡萄酒性质的
葡萄酒酿造学；[园艺] 葡萄栽培法
葡萄酒商；酿造葡萄酒的人

phrases.tran_cn: 马沙文雅岛；马撒葡萄园岛（岛屿名，位于美国马萨诸塞州东南海岸附近）

trans.tran_cn: 葡萄园，工作场所，苦心经营的地方
trans.tran_en: a piece of land where grapevines are grown in order to produce wine
